name: Curse of Iron
description:
Content warning:

- This game contains a lot of references to blood.

---

A small project I did in a few months, Curse of Iron is a very short horror themed metroidvania, with a focus on fun movement.

---

Known bug: game timer doesn't show at the end in some cases.

Credits:

-Horrifi shader by Gizmo199

-Main menu and game timer programmed by Melody aka. Noty, my girlfriend.

-Most of the platformer logic by Shaun Spalding's tutorials.
